level.heading: Procurement system inapplicable.
level.text: Except as provided in § 34-2202.17(b), Chapter 3A of Title 2 shall not apply to the Authority.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 19-171 substituted "Chapter 3A of Title 2" for "§ 2-301.01 et seq.".

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-111, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 34-2201.01.
For history of Law 19-171, see notes under § 34-808.02.
